mapper.select: SELECT distinct r.id,r.url as resourceUrl,r.name as resourceName,r.eng_name AS engName,r.is_menu AS ismenu,r.posorder, r.parent_id as topid,r.cls_name as clsname,r.create_time FROM cpsx_sys_dim_resource r LEFT JOIN cpsx_sys_map_role_resource role ON r.id=role.resource_id ORDER BY r.posorder ASC
